amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the title V education block grant program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment for "school improvement programs" for innovative programs, as authorized by part A of title V of the Elementary and Secondary Educatino Act of 1965, and the amount otherwise provided by the Act for "education and the disadvantaged" is hereby reduced by, $20,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shadegg amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
